New Records: Finn Allen scored his second T20I century with 137 runs in 62 balls
Key Match Events: Finn Allen tore into Haris Rauf in the 3rd over, clobbering three sixes and two fours
Finn Allen took three sixes off Rauf in the 12th over, bringing up his century with the third maximum
Haris Rauf conceded 60 runs in his quota of 4 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Man of the Match Finn Allen said: 'Feels good. Wanted to keep it nice and simple, stay deep in the crease and hit through the line.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The hosts sealed the series with an unassailable 3-0 lead with two games to go
Finn Allen’s stunning knock included only 5 fours but was glittered with 16 sixes
Others: Finn Allen said: 'We had a deal before that [Shaheen] wouldn’t bowl me any bumpers, he bowled me a bumper so was just having some banter with him.'
Finn Allen said: 'One of Rauf over covers.' was his favorite six
